message.content:
After carefully tracing the lineage relationships, I found that Donna is connected to Eugene through a long chain of ancestors and descendants. The path goes from Donna up through her ancestry (including Alexis, Sara, Natalie, Ethan, Danielle, Lori, Diane, Jerry, Shirley, Albert, Janice, Abigail, Raymond, Bruce, Katherine, John, Diana, Julia, Andrew, Michael, Barbara, Ronald, Brenda, Jason, Margaret, Wayne, Zachary, Harold, Christian, Kayla, Thomas, Richard, Kelly, George, Mark, Julie, Henry, Joyce, Gary, Jacob, Brian, Victoria, Eric, Russell, Rachel, Jack, Jeffrey, Evelyn, Teresa, Lawrence, Michelle, Joshua, Kimberly, Gerald, Karen, Joe, Keith, Samuel, Paul, Carolyn, Donald, Bradley) and then down to Eugene.

Since the path goes up from Donna to common ancestors and then down to Eugene, this means Donna is an ancestor of Eugene.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
